net.xeoh.plugins.base
Interface Option

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
AddPluginsFromOption, GetPluginOption, PublishOption, SubscribeOption
All Known Implementing Classes:
OptionCapabilities, OptionInstantRequest, OptionPluginSelector, OptionReportAfter, OptionSilentPublish
public interface Option
extends java.io.Serializable

Used as optional arguments to classes.

All options have to be serializable, because they might be transferred over the network. Options are a great way of keeping interfaces small yet powerful. See the usage guide for more infos on options.

Author:
Ralf Biedert
See Also:
OptionUtils
